text: Jon Watts (born June 28, 1981) is an American movie director, producer and screenwriter. He is best known for directing the Marvel Cinematic Universe superhero movie Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017) and its sequel Spider-Man: Far From Home (2019). He also directed and co-wrote Clown (2014) and Cop Car (2015). He also directed many episodes of the parody television news series Onion News Network. Watts was born in Fountain, Colorado. He is married to Dianne McGunigle. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:American movie directors Category:American movie producers Category:American screenwriters Category:American television directors Category:Writers from Colorado
title: Jon Watts
